dmca.title: Freeimagehosting: Demand for Removal of Jennifer Aniston Photos
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Edward Ruttenberg [mailto:eruttenberg@lpsla.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 04, 2007 9:31 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: Freeimagehosting: Demand for Removal of Jennifer Aniston
Photos

 

Per the e-mail instructions received from abuse@ev1servers.com, this
takedown demand, made in full compliance with Section 512 of the
Copyright Act, is being sent directly to you, who have been represented
to be the legal counsel.

 

Prompt action is required to avoid legal action.

 

________________________________

From: Edward Ruttenberg
Sent: Fri 3/2/2007 5:49 PM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'; 'domains@netgears.com'
Cc: 'Hampton, Carolyn (NBC Universal)'; Burg, David (NBC Universal);
Jacobson, Craig; Ragsac, Ted (NBC Universal); Thomas Peistrup
Subject: Freeimagehosting: Demand for Removal of Jennifer Aniston Photos

Attached is a letter demanding that the stolen photos of Jennifer
Aniston not be displayed on your website or otherwise exploited.

 

Edward A. Ruttenberg, Esq.

LEOPOLD, PETRICH & SMITH, P.C.

2049 Century Park East, Suite, 3110

Los Angeles, California 90067-3274

Phone:  310/277-3333

    Fax:  310/277-7444
